@graph.name: Genome Assembly of MRSA using Illumina MiSeq Data
@graph.description:
Genome Assembly of MRSA using Illumina MiSeq Data

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Genome Assembly of a bacterial genome (MRSA) sequenced using Illumina MiSeq Data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/mrsa-illumina/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
